title: Lucidia Persona Packet
description: Structured response envelope expected from Lucidia persona evaluations.

verdict.description: Plain-language recommendation rendered by the persona.

balanced_ternary.description: Balanced ternary vote where '+' affirms, '-' rejects, and '0' abstains or remains neutral.

confidence.description: Self-reported confidence for the verdict on a closed interval of [0, 1].

justification.description: Short rationale that backs the verdict and vote.

evidence.description: Optional citations or structured evidence supporting the justification.

confidence_notes.description: Optional explanation for the selected confidence value.
